page.title: 06The Dalston Gala
page.content: Every year in Dalston we have a gala day. It is normally in June.It lasts for one day. The people that go can enter races, some people enter little things like the treasure hunt. In the treasure hunt little sticks are put into the ground to tell you where the treasure is. If you won any of the races or the fancy dress for yourself or your bike then you got a load of sweets and money. It is free to get in and the children get afree tea. It is organised by Dalston Parish Council. There are shows like the magician and the puppets. There was a fire engine display and a B.M.X track. There was also a 'bat the mouse', roll the ball on the pound, a golf competition and a kick the ball through the frame competition. I think it was very enjoyable. May be you'll come one day.
